text: (And verily We gave the Children of Israel the Scripture and the Command) knowledge and understanding (and the prophethood) they had among them many prophets and Scriptures, (and provided them with good things) and provided them with quails and honey; and it is also said this means: and provided them with spoils of war (and favoured them above (all) peoples) above all the people of their time in that We bestowed upon them the Scripture and messenger;
